ai-tha-ap496:0.3_0: What if it is the Elder’s dwelling place to be given to the Elder Nun
ai-tha-ap496:1.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him:
ai-tha-ap496:1.3_0: After remembering the Buddha, the Sister,
ai-tha-ap496:1.4_0: I woke up in the air.
ai-tha-ap496:2.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap496:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap496:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap496:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Talk.
ai-tha-ap496:8.1_0: What is the fourth Elder Suppiya
